statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_data
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT id, post_date FROM social_media_sentiment_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, post_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_sentiment_data
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT id, username, post_text FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE username LIKE 'johnny%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, username, post_date FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%happy%' OR post_text LIKE '%excited%' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT id, username, sentiment_score, post_text FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE username = 'alice' AND sentiment_score < 3.0 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_data WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND sentiment_score <= 3.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, user_id FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 456 AND post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT sa.analysis_id, sa.sentiment_score, sa.sentiment_category, sm.user_id FROM sentiment_analysis_results sa JOIN social_media_posts sm ON sa.post_id = sm.post_id WHERE sa.sentiment_category = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM social_media_comments;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, count(comment_id) as total_comments FROM social_media_comments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM social_media_comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date <= '2021-01-01';
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_label FROM social_media_comments JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON social_media_comments.comment_id = sentiment_analysis_results.comment_id;
SELECT user_id, username, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM users JOIN social_media_comments ON users.user_id = social_media_comments.user_id GROUP BY user_id, username;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_sentiment_score FROM social_media_comments;
SELECT * FROM Sentiment_Data;
SELECT tweet, sentiment_score FROM Sentiment_Data WHERE sentiment_score > 0;
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM User_Profile ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT hashtag, tweet_count FROM Trending_Hashtags WHERE tweet_count >= 1000 ORDER BY tweet_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM User_Sentiment GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_score > 50;
SELECT tweet, sentiment_score FROM Sentiment_Data WHERE sentiment_score > 0 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM User_Profile WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_analysis_date FROM User_Sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0 AND sentiment_analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT hashtag, tweet_count FROM Trending_Hashtags WHERE tweet_count > 500 ORDER BY tweet_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, followers_count FROM User_Profile WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_content, post_author FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_sentiment = 'Positive';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT post_id, reaction_type FROM post_reactions WHERE reaction_user_id = 12345 AND reaction_timestamp >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT post_id, analysis_result FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_author, post_timestamp FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT post_content, post_author, post_timestamp FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_gender FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age >= 18;
SELECT post_id, reaction_type, reaction_user_id, reaction_timestamp FROM post_reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY reaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, analysis_result, accuracy FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
